levels

Interface LevelInformation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseLevel, DirectHit, FinalFour, Green3, WideEasy

    public interface LevelInformation
    Information about a level interface.
    Author:
    Tomer Davidor, Guy Blachar

    • Method Summary
